output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Number: Present (11240002) - This indicates it's electoral propaganda.
2. Candidate References: - Mentions "Simion" and "Ciolacu" directly - Makes accusations about PSD and AUR working together - Clearly identifies presidential candidates and their parties
3. Public Addressing: - Large scale paid advertising (100,000-124,999 impressions) - Broad audience targeting (500,001-1,000,000 estimated reach) - Uses public platforms (Facebook, Instagram)
4. Electoral Objective: - Direct call to vote ("ieși la vot") - Attempts to influence voting decision - Makes political claims about other candidates/parties - Timing specifically mentions December 1st (election day)
5. Not Journalistic: - Clearly partisan messaging - Contains emotional appeals - Makes unsubstantiated claims about political opponents
6. Campaign Context: - Posted during presidential campaign period - Actively discourages voting for specific candidates/parties - Promotes PNL's position
This is clearly electoral propaganda targeting the presidential election, with specific mentions of candidates and direct calls to vote.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Makes direct references to candidates - Has clear electoral objective - Uses paid advertising to reach wide audience - Contains direct call to vote - Attempts to influence voting decisions
conclusion.message-for-police: PNL Galati, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin publicarea și promovarea unei reclame pe Facebook (ID: 539157538894856) după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală. Postarea conține mesaje electorale explicite, face referire directă la candidați prezidențiali (Ciolacu, Simion), include îndemnuri la vot ("ieși la vot"), și este marcată cu cod CMF (11240002), confirmând natura sa de propagandă electorală. Reclama este programată să ruleze și după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel explicit prevederile legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale.
